name: AeroDynamic Aviation - San Jose
baseAirport: RHV -Reid-Hillview of Santa Clara County Airport
about: AeroDynamic Aviation, established in 1960, is a premier flight school dedicated to teaching the art of flying safely and proficiently. With locations at Reid-Hillview Airport in San Jose, Salinas Municipal Airport, and Monterey Peninsula Airport, we offer comprehensive flight training for Sport and Private Pilot, Instrument, Commercial, Multi-Engine, ATP, CFI, Tailwheel, Aerobatics, and mountain flying. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are former military and commercial pilots, teach with a passion for flying, emphasizing traditional stick-and-rudder skills. We provide ground school, aircraft rentals, and specialized training in vintage and modern aircraft, including tailwheel endorsements. Our goal is to build skilled and confident pilots in a safe and enjoyable environment. Come fly with us and experience the joy of aviation.
